abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Bolsa Familia
            Project for Brazil is to reduce poverty and inequality today
            and in the future, and to promote human capital investments
            among poor families through the direct monetary transfers
            and incentives to poor families. The Bolsa Familia Program:
            a) consolidates and rationalizes existing federal cash
            transfer programs; b) promotes efficiency in the use of
            public resources; c) improves the system for identifying the
            beneficiary population; d) leverages synergies in jointly
            promoting education and health and nutrition conditions; e)
            strengthens monitoring and evaluation; and, f) leverages
            opportunities to promote vertical integration in the social
            safety net between federal and sub-national levels.
